ygData.subject: Re: Will not sufficient??
ygData.msgSnippet: Damon: NPCs hit for MORE than anyone at their level. Why does Dark Elf Corporals con green to me, yet, they would hit someone of my level for over 70 damage?
ygData.messageBody:
Damon:

NPCs hit for MORE than anyone at their level. Why does Dark Elf Corporals
con green to me, yet, they would hit someone of my level for over 70 damage?
And when someone kills the Corporal, they drop a bronze weapon?

Now, to the contents of your post:

You said, "Thats a pretty damn bad level 40+ person there. Probably a dark
elf :P". Yes, it is a Dark Elf, but our str DOES NOT add 100 damage to our
hits. It was interesting to hear you say, "Just goes to show your
ineptitude". Actually, you are the one that is wrong. NPCs DO NOT have the
same stats we have.

About your claim upon seeing a level 20 doing 100 damage is, to put it
bluntly, a lie.

You seem to have an inexhaustible list of untrue facts. I will respond to
your
latest post, but please do not give any more arguments until you have
evidence that what you have said is true. When that time comes, I will
gladly take back my words - if what you say is indeed accurate (but alas,
they won't be).

PS - I would like to say that I love your calculations. A level 20 would
have a 4x multiplier to the weapon attack value (i.e.. "a level 20 warrior
with the executioners axe can do 100 damage, 4 x 25"), but a level 30 ranger
is okay to have a 3x multiplier with a Demon Claw . . . And I had a laugh
when you said that Demon Claws are low level for Rangers simply because they
have a attack of 5 - that absolutely demonstrates your knowledge in weapons.
